about:
I’m a Software Engineer with over 4 years of experience at Wipro Limited, where I’ve worked on building scalable backend systems and interactive web applications using Java and modern frameworks. My strength lies in writing clean, efficient code and solving complex problems—skills that helped me earn the Google India Challenge Scholarship, standing out among 10,000+ participants.

Now, I'm channeling my experience into the world of Machine Learning. With a solid foundation in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering, I’m excited to build intelligent systems that solve real-world problems and shape the future.
